name: RuneTech
description: Cast spells and use magic crystals to solve puzzles and fight your way through cleansing an ancient cave of its evil corruption.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 2 GB available space
